description: Gain a solid Windows, Linux, network, and server administration foundation, and the practical skills to secure these environments.
Learn to master cloud security, penetration testing (both offensive and defensive), and cyber threat intelligence analysis.
Become proficient at managing risks using data loss prevention (DLP) strategies and navigating compliance with international standards such as ISO 27001 and NIST.
